introduction:
Greetings! I am Mikael, a seasoned software engineering wizard with a knack for developing innovative applications, including dynamic mobile solutions. My current focus is on crafting seamless user experiences with React, bringing both creativity and precision to every project.  

 You will find a collection of contributions, showcasing the magic of modern technology through meticulously designed applications. Each project is a blend of technical expertise and creative problem-solving, aimed at delivering exceptional digital experiences.
